signup_confirm_email.subject: Action - Confirm Your Email
signup_confirm_email.message:
You (or someone else) entered this email address when creating an account at {{global:site_name}}.

If you did not create an account, you can ignore this message.

To confirm your email, please proceed to
 {{global:site_url}}#/confirm/{{args:hash}}

or enter {{args:hash}} when requested after login.

This action was requested from the IP address {{_SERVER:REMOTE_ADDR}}.

password_reset_request.subject: Account Access Attempted
password_reset_request.message:
You (or someone else) entered this email address when trying to change the password of an {{global:site_name}} account.

If you did not request this, someone else may have access to your email account. We recommend you change your email account password and your {{global:site_name}} account password to be safe.

To continue the password reset process, please proceed to
 {{global:site_url}}#/reset/{{args:hash}}
 within 60 minutes of receiving this email.

This action was requested from the IP address {{_SERVER:REMOTE_ADDR}}.

password_reset_request_fail.message:
You (or someone else) entered this email address when trying to change the password of an account at {{global:site_name}}.

However, this email address is not in our database of registered users and therefore the attempted password change has failed.

If you are a customer of {{global:site_name}} and were expecting this email, please try again using the email address you gave when you opening your account.

If you are not an {{global:site_name}} customer, please ignore this email.

For information about {{global:site_name}}, please visit {{global:site_url}}.

This action was requested from the IP address {{_SERVER:REMOTE_ADDR}}.

password_reset_request_new.subject: Account Created
password_reset_request_new.message:
Hopefully this email doesn't come as a surprise.  An account has just been created for you by {{from:user_name_first}} at {{global:site_name}}.

To complete your account, proceed to
 {{global:site_url}}#/reset/{{args:hash}}


This action was requested from the IP address {{_SERVER:REMOTE_ADDR}}.

password_changed_notification.subject: Account Password Changed
password_changed_notification.message:
Your {{global:site_name}} account password was just changed.

If you didn't make this change, request a password reset immediately by visiting {{global:site_url}}#/sign/reset.

email_changed_notification.subject: Account Email Changed
email_changed_notification.message:
Your {{global:site_name}} account email was just changed.

To confirm your email, please proceed to
 {{global:site_url}}#/confirm/{{args:hash}}

This action was requested from the IP address {{_SERVER:REMOTE_ADDR}}.

new_follow.subject: You were just followed.
new_follow.message: You were just followed by {{from:user_name_first}}.  Check out their profile at {{global:site_url}}#/user/profile/{{from:user_ID}} and maybe follow them back.

new_message.subject: New direct message waiting for you.
new_message.message: You were just send a direct message from {{from:user_name_first}}.  You can read it and reply at {{global:site_url}}#/user/message/{{from:user_ID}}.
